9. Udoh deposited #150 00 in the bank. At the end of 5 
years the simple interest on the principal was #55 00. 
At what rate per annum was the interest paid? 
20. Factorize x2 + 2a + ax + 2x 
A. (x + 2a)(x + 1) B. (x + 2a)(x - 1) 
C. (x2 - 1)(x + a) D. (x + 2)(x + a) 
 
21. Solve the equation 3x2 + 6x – 2 = 0 
A. x = -1,3/3 B. x = -1,15/3 
C. x = -2, 23/3 D. x = -2, 215/3

10.   A number of pencils were shared out among Bisi, Sola 
and Tunde in the ratio 2:3:5 respectively. If Bisi got 5, 
how many were shared out? 
A. 15 B. 25 
C. 12x/35(x+1) D. 12/35x + 35

11. The ages of Tosan and Isa differ by 6 and the product

old in what year was Ike exactly half his father’s age?

17. Factorize completely. 
3a + 125ax3

C. (2a + 5x)(4 - 10ax + 25ax2)

A. -3/5 B. 3/5 
C. –7/5 D. 7/5

28. Find the values of x which satisfy the equation 
16x – 5x 4x + 4 = 0 
A. 1 and 4 B. –2 and 2 
C. 0 and 1 D. 1 and 0 
 
29. a/b –c/d = k, find the value of 
(3a2 – ac + c2)/(3b2 – bd + d2) in term of k 
A. 3k2 B. 3k – k2 
C. 17k2/4 D. k2 
 
30. At what point does the straight line y = 2x + 1 intersect 
the curve y = 2x2 + 5x – 1? 
A. (-2,-3) and (1/2, 2) B. (-1/2 0) and (2, 5) 
C. (1/2, 2) and (1, 3) D. (1, 3) and (2, 5)

C. 14 D. 12
